text: The 1959–60 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky State College during the 1959-60 NCAA University Division Basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by future Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame coach Edgar Diddle. The Hilltoppers won the Ohio Valley Conference championship, as well as the conference's automatic bid to the 1960 NCAA University Division Basketball Tournament, where they advanced to the Sweet Sixteen.2019-2020 WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 This team was very balanced, with four players being named to the All- Conference Team: Charlie Osborne, Bobby Rascoe, Al Ellison, and Don Parsons.2019-2020 OVC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 4 May 2020 ==Schedule== 1959-60 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 12 May 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 1960 NCAA University Division Basketball Tournament ==References== Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
